title: CommandSuspendUntil
description:
PAS pg. 34, riga 706, keyword: LD_CIR/CSIDESE2.ClcStr.ctlVal.
Sospensione totale del servizio di ricarica da garantire fino al tempo indicato.

Timetag.title: Timetag
Timetag.description: unix timestamp of when the command was sent

Tmax.title: Tmax
Tmax.description: unix timestamp until which the command must be enforced
